diagram_logic_form: The measure of angle $BNM$ is $2x - 5$ degrees.
Point $B$ lies on the line connecting $N$ and $L$.
Point $L$ lies on the circle with center $B$ and radius $3.0$.
Point $M$ lies on the same circle with center $B$ and radius $3.0$.
Point $N$ also lies on the same circle with center $B$ and radius $3.0$.
The length of the line $LM$ is equal to the length of the line $MN$.
line_instances: There are lines $LB$, $LM$, $NB$, $NL$, $NM$ forming the diagram.
circle_instances: There is a circle with center at point B.
